meanings.definition: Opposing or countering the effects of aging.
meanings.sent1: She used an antiaging cream to help her skin look younger.
meanings.sent2: The antiaging properties of the lotion helped reduce wrinkles.
meanings.sent3: The antiaging serum made her feel like a time traveler reversing the years.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an antiaging elixir, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The antiaging treatment was like a magic potion, restoring youthfulness.

meanings.definition: Products or treatments designed to prevent or reduce the signs of aging.
meanings.sent1: She bought an antiaging cream to improve her skin's appearance.
meanings.sent2: The antiaging industry is booming with new products every day.
meanings.sent3: Using the antiaging mask felt like a spa day at home.
meanings.sent4: The antiaging serum was her secret weapon against time's effects.
meanings.sent5: The antiaging lotion was her daily shield against wrinkles.
